title: Colts add RB Bradshaw
text:
Colts running back Ahmad Bradshaw Gallery 2 photos October 15, 2015 Updated Oct 15, 2015 at 12:21 AM EDT 
INDIANAPOLIS (21Alive) - The Indianapolis Colts have once again turn to running back Ahmad Bradshaw to add depth to their backfield. 
Bradshaw was signed Wednesday, starting his third different season with the Colts. 
Bradshaw was productive in each of the past two seasons before going down with season-ending injuries. What are your thoughts CLICK HERE to leave us a "QUESTION OF THE DAY” comment.
